about_the_game:
Adira is a young girl raised by her father, Torion, but they have very different worldviews. While Adira is a rebellious spirit who longs for a life surrounded by people, Torion prefers the serenity of an isolated existence. Their relationship has its ups and downs, yet they share an inseparable bond and deeply care for each other. Everything changes when Torion goes missing. As Adira embarks on a quest to find her beloved father, she must navigate a wild world without his support while trying to unravel the mystery of his disappearance.

Explore an Untamed World

Venture into a stone-age setting filled with diverse wildlife and natural hazards around every corner.

FIGHT FOR YOUR LIFE

In Tribe of the Accord, survival is a constant battle. Face wild animals, navigate dangerous caves, and evolve into a skilled hunter to protect Adira and overcome the challenges of the wilderness.

Aquire New Abilities


Master Adira's agility as she skillfully utilizes her tools, enhancing her capabilities with each new skill she acquires.

Cook With Purpose

Every ingredient serves a unique purpose, allowing you to craft meals that boost Adira's strength and survivability.

short_description: Tribe of the Accord is a pixel-art action game where you play as Adira, a young huntress on a quest to rescue her kidnapped father. Throughout your journey, you'll gain new abilities, form alliances, and discover your place in a harsh and unforgiving world.
